attributes.action: Review the effectiveness of "The Standards Board for England " (SBE)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
80% of cases are rejected - Joke!

Poor case investigations / they fail to address public complaints - miss out complete letters containing complaints!

Very slow response times / ignore the public until repeatedly prompted!

The SBE are only accountable to themselves - mistakes are covered up / swept under the carpet!

They allow Parish Councils to get away with many mistakes.

Recommend an outside body/separate investigator to review case & procedures within the SBE.

Waste of public funds in it's present state!
